channel.title: Halloween Thread!
channel.description:
So, with Halloween coming up very soon, I thought I'd make a Halloween thread. Anything goes. If you're dressing up, what are you dressing as? Going to parties? Sitting at home brooding in the black to emo music? What are you doing? Have something cool to show? Perhaps something you found on the 'net?
I'll begin by posting this light show on someone's house:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GUAV_1jBJB4[/url]
Enjoy! :slight_smile:

item.title: Halloween Thread!
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Ordinarily I pass out candy and wish I could take the garden hose to the little snots that try to sneak more than one candy from the pot. Apparently I’m going to hang out with my girlfriend dressed as a geek- i.e. in a secondhand Symantec shirt I got in a Goodwill for four bucks.

Read full topic

item.title: Halloween Thread!
item.dc:creator: Rossman
item.description:
I’m not doing anything for Halloween. It’s on a Sunday. It’s weird and is going to be depressing on Monday when we have to go to work and school. I don’t even have a costume. I’m more excited for election day on Nov. 2nd.

Read full topic

item.title: Halloween Thread!
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
I knew a girl in the U.K. that didnt understand what “making easter eggs” was all about either. Anyway, yeah I think Halloween is only celebrated in the U.S.

So in respect for the thread, I know most of you have already seen this but I think the rest of you may get a kick out of this.
https://www.catzeyes93.com/tf2costumes.html

Read full topic
